title: Drawing, "Botanical Sketches from South America: a Palm, Groups of Trees, Hanging Twigs, a Big Tree  beside a House, and a Flying Crane.", 1853, probably May
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top row left: Palm; again at top of right bottom: ('Saiba' struck out) tree / Ceiba; and again at right bottom: crane.
description: Horizontal view containing a palm at top left; a group of trees at top center; a group of trees on a distant hill at top right; hanging twigs at bottom left; a group of trees at bottom center; and a big tree beside a house with palms behind at top of right; and a crane flying toward right at bottom right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Botanical Sketches from South America: a Palm, Groups of Trees, Hanging Twigs, a Big Tree  beside a House, and a Flying Crane.", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-106.
